name: Get Variable Car Loan Repayment Calculation

testSteps.description: Given I logged into the API earlier

When I request a repayment calculation for a loan with values
| loanType | amount | term | repayment | repayment Frequency |
| CAR_VARIABLE | 25000.0 | 48 | 628.75 | monthly |

Then I should get the following values returned
| loanAmount | termInMonths | monthlyRepaymentAmount | fortnightlyRepaymentAmount | weeklyRepaymentAmount |
| 25000.0 | 12 | 2192.75 | 1012.03 | 506.01 |
| 25000.0 | 24 | 1148.50 | 530.07 | 265.03 |
| 25000.0 | 36 | 801.50 | 369.92 | 184.96 |
| 25000.0 | 48 | 628.75 | 290.19 | 145.09 |
| 25000.0 | 60 | 525.75 | 242.65 | 121.32 |

title: Get Variable Car Loan Repayment Calculation
